sentence.Network_en: All bitches should be spayed unless being used for breeding.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非是用作种犬，所有的母犬都应摘除卵巢。

list.abs: To castrate or spay ., 阉割或切除卵巢.

who spayed you , man ., 谁让你这么做的.

entry.def: When a female animal is spayed, it has its ovaries removed so that it cannot become pregnant.

example.ex: All bitches should be spayed unless being used for breeding.
example.tran: 除非是用作种犬，所有的母犬都应摘除卵巢。

means.word_mean: 1. (of a female animal) having the ovaries removed

auth_sentence.content: Dogs, after all - particularly spayed city dogs that have been denied their lusts - have loyalty as an overriding emotion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dogs, after all - particularly spayed city dogs that have been denied their lusts - have loyalty as an overriding emotion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dogs, after all - particularly spayed city dogs that have been denied their lusts - have loyalty as an overriding emotion.

auth_sentence.content: "My sphinx had become a spayed cat purring contentedly at my feet," he wrote.
